io.py

matlatzinca.io.get_table_text(model, newline='\n', delimiter='\t', newline_replace=None)[source]

Get all elements from table model, including the header

Parameters

  • selection (Qt selection) – Selection from a table

  • newline (str, optional) – character for newline, by default

  • delimiter (str, optional) – character for delimiter, by default

Returns

Text that can be exported or pasted

Return type

str

Parameters

  • newline (str, optional) – character for newline, by default

  • delimiter (str, optional) – character for delimiter, by default

Returns
